title: Famiglia Martini
creator_credit: Franco Cavarra, Rosa Colosimo and Scopo Media Productions
brief_description: This tape consists of three Italian language programmes aimed at years 7 to 9. 1. “L’Incontro”. The younger members of the Martini famili go to the disco. 2.”Alla saluta”. Mr. Martini is encouraged by members of his family to go on a diet. 3.”La Partita a tennis”. Conflict occurs over who goes to tennis.
